Title: Relates to determination of public assistance eligibility; repealer
Summary: Relates to determination of public assistance eligibility; reduces time frame for determinations on safety net assistance.
LawCode: Amd §§131-a, 131-c, 131-n, 158 & 22, rpld §153 sub 8, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to determination of public assistance eligibility and amounts; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
